description: Easy to make, but full of complex spicing and strong flavours. All the reward, not much of the effort.
name: Charruso De Frango Grilled Chicken Drumsticks Wrapped in Bacon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Combine all the sauce ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.
Heat up a skillet to a medium heat with 1 tbs of olive oil and fry the chicken drumsticks for 8 minutes while turning.
Now wrap the bacon around the drumsticks tightly and place into a casserole dish with the sauce covering evenly.
Bake in the oven for 30 minutes covered with tinfoil, taking out twice to marinade the chicken with the sauces. Serve with a choice of condiments and parsley to garnish.
